obsidian.description:
Obsidian vault access via WebSocket bridge. Provides comprehensive vault, task, and dataview management for Obsidian notes.

IMPORTANT: Each MCP tool (mcp__obsidian-mcp-connector__*) has detailed descriptions with specific usage guidelines. ALWAYS read and follow the individual tool descriptions before using any tool - they contain critical information about:
- Tool-specific parameters and formats
- Priority order for choosing between tools
- Dataview metadata format requirements
- Task creation/editing best practices
- When to preserve existing metadata

To discover available tools and their descriptions:
1. Use mcp__obsidian-mcp-connector__plugins_inspect with no parameters to list all tools
2. Each tool name indicates its category: vault_*, dataview_*, tasks_*, plugins_*
3. Tool descriptions include inputSchema with required/optional parameters

OBSIDIAN FILE CONVENTIONS:
- Use Obsidian-style backlinks: [[filename]]
- Use internal TOC links: [[#Section Name]]
- Follow Obsidian file naming (lowercase, hyphens/spaces)
- Tasks use Dataview inline metadata format: [key:: value]

For detailed tool-specific guidelines, refer to each tool's description field.
